Module kivakit.build.metadata
Package com.telenav.kivakit.build.metadata

Class MetadataUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.build.metadata.MetadataUpdater
  • public class MetadataUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
    This application is run from Maven builds to produce a build.properties file in src/main/java containing the build number, date and name.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
    See Also:
    Metadata

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MetadataUpdater()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] arguments)
      Writes a build.properties file out to the given output folder with the following entries: build-number - The current build number since the start of the KivaKit epoch build-date - The current build date as [year].[month].[day-of-month] build-name - The current build name

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MetadataUpdater

        public MetadataUpdater()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] arguments)
        Writes a build.properties file out to the given output folder with the following entries:
        • build-number - The current build number since the start of the KivaKit epoch
        • build-date - The current build date as [year].[month].[day-of-month]
        • build-name - The current build name

        Some KivaKit scripts read this information, as well as kivakit-core-kernel.

        Parameters:
        arguments - Output folder to write metadata to
